CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1945, pg. 3 reads: "Business Men Select Five Leading Citizens - The five persons chosen for outstanding interracial work in 1944 in Pittsburgh and awarded citations at the Business and Professional Association's banquet at the YMCA last Thursday were Mrs. Alma Illery, Assemblyman Homer S. Brown, Mrs. Abraham Lincoln, John H. Morgart and Sherman Harmon..."
TitMainTitle: Man wearing dark pinstriped suit, standing behind long banquet table with other men and women, including Alma Illery wearing dark hat with veil, seated on either side, in Centre Avenue YMCA during Business and Professional Association's banquet
